data.title: Metro Nashville Public Schools
data.meta_description: Information for Metro Schools seniors, including graduation times, dates and locations.
data.text:
College and Career Expo is September 9

Meet college and university admissions teams at the MNPS College and Career Expo, from 3 p.m. to 6:30 p.m.

Monday, September 9. What can you expect? Learn about:

Scholarships and financial aid

Academic programs

Career and job opportunities

Tennessee Education Lottery Scholarship Program

and more

Important Information for MNPS Seniors

Senior year fills students with excitement about graduation, as well as enthusiasm, and sometimes anxiety, about entering the next phase of their lives. These resources can help guide students, and the important adults in their lives, through the planning process for graduating from high school, entering postsecondary education or training, enlisting in military service, or joining the workforce.

Scholarships and Opportunities Schoology Group

For more information about scholarships, students and families are encouraged to join the MNPS Scholarships and Opportunities Schoology Group. Access Code: JXXB-S5MV-HKQQH

For individualized help, please contact your school counselor.
